failtime.help: Number of retry attempts before the server is considered down (1 - 10, default = 5)
failtime.name: failtime

gateway-ip.help: Gateway IP address used to probe the server.
gateway-ip.name: gateway-ip

gateway-ip6.help: Gateway IPv6 address used to probe the server.
gateway-ip6.name: gateway-ip6

http-agent.help: String in the http-agent field in the HTTP header.
http-agent.name: http-agent

http-get.help: If you are monitoring an HTML server you can send an HTTP-GET request with a custom string. Use this option to define the string.
http-get.name: http-get

http-match.help: String that you expect to see in the HTTP-GET requests of the traffic to be monitored.
http-match.name: http-match

interval.help: Detection interval in milliseconds (500 - 3600 * 1000 msec, default = 500).
interval.name: interval

packet-size.help: Packet size of a twamp test session,
packet-size.name: packet-size

password.help: Twamp controller password in authentication mode
password.name: password

port.help: Port number of the traffic to be used to monitor the server.
port.name: port

probe-count.help: Number of most recent probes that should be used to calculate latency and jitter (5 - 30, default = 30).
probe-count.name: probe-count

probe-timeout.help: Time to wait before a probe packet is considered lost (500 - 5000 msec, default = 500).
probe-timeout.name: probe-timeout

protocol.help: Protocols used to monitor the server.
protocol.name: protocol

recoverytime.help: Number of successful responses received before server is considered recovered (1 - 10, default = 5).
recoverytime.name: recoverytime

server.help: IP address of the server(s) to be monitored.
server.name: server

source-ip.help: Source IP address used in packet to the server.
source-ip.name: source-ip

source-ip6.help: Source IPv6 address used in packet to the server.
source-ip6.name: source-ip6

srcintf.help: Interface that receives the traffic to be monitored.
srcintf.name: srcintf
